name: Harvest Exchange
description: Made for Gardeners, by a gardener. Harvest Exchange facilitates the need for trade, buying, selling, and sharing of produce in local communities.

name: Perfect Lips
description: Perfect Lips is a platform where it brings lipstick connoisseurs together to talk about their most favorite subject. Fellow lipstick fans can leave reviews for various lipsticks from any brand and can collect information from multiple users about what's worth being in their makeup collection.

name: FitCheck
description: FitCheck is an Instagram-style app that's all about fitness accountability. Users can create a profile and post fitness-related images with descriptions, tags, workout ratings, and difficulty ratings.

name: Rick and Morty Wiki
description: The Rick and Morty Wiki app, is an application that uses the Rick and Morty data base to showcase characters from the show Rick and Morty.
